{"agentExecutionMode":"manual","isPanelCollapsed":true,"displayedAnnouncements":[],"conversations":{"5e0d57f6-1d14-4d57-a5db-4aad6b72a3f0":{"id":"5e0d57f6-1d14-4d57-a5db-4aad6b72a3f0","createdAtIso":"2025-11-22T07:27:32.751Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2025-11-22T07:27:32.751Z","chatHistory":[],"feedbackStates":{},"toolUseStates":{},"draftExchange":{"request_message":"","rich_text_json_repr":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph"}]},"mentioned_items":[],"status":"draft"},"selectedModelId":"claude-sonnet-4-5","requestIds":[],"isPinned":false,"isShareable":false,"extraData":{"isAgentConversation":true,"hasDirtyEdits":false},"personaType":0},"35234ac8-1653-45e7-ad38-ce08a7001aac":{"id":"35234ac8-1653-45e7-ad38-ce08a7001aac","createdAtIso":"2025-11-22T07:27:32.834Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2025-11-22T07:46:51.626Z","chatHistory":[{"request_id":"0888723e-c97c-40c0-85e6-b19f59a04fa6","uuid":"0cd55094-2309-4722-b96d-6bff421ce056","chatItemType":"agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","status":"success","fromTimestamp":0,"toTimestamp":1763796452835},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"93c363af-5b7a-4ae5-b7a9-5422b9534a77","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:28:02.486Z","request_message":"You are an expert Flutter developer using GetX state management.

Build a complete, production-ready, viral ADHD/mood shifter app called "MoodShift AI" for **both Android and iOS** with these EXACT specifications:

MAIN FEATURE (THE ONE THING THAT MAKES USERS ADDICTED & GENERATES ALL REVENUE):
- Single screen: "Hold the mic → say anything → AI instantly gives a 10–30 second funny, kind, perfectly-timed voice response that fixes your brain"
- User can say literally anything (bored, anxious, "I'm going to smoke", swear words, random scream) → AI always responds with one of 5 styles:
 1. Chaos Energy (hyper dares)
 2. Gentle Grandma (soft breathing)
 3. Permission Slip (official excuse)
 4. Reality Check (kind truth)
 5. Micro Dare (tiny action)
- SAFETY: Never judge. If harmful intent → gently redirect with breathing/water/ice + ❤️
- This frictionless voice-in/voice-out flow is why users open 10–25 times/day and happily watch rewarded ads for "power-ups"

MAX PROFIT ADMOB PLACEMENT (EXACT STRATEGY – DO NOT CHANGE):
- Banner ad: always visible at bottom (50.h height)
- Interstitial: every 4th shift (skippable after 5 sec)
- After EVERY successful shift show these 3 rewarded ad buttons (this is the money printer):
 1. "Make this 2× stronger!" → replay louder + confetti explosion
 2. "Unlock Golden Voice 1 hour" → premium warm voice
 3. "Remove ads for 24 hours" → full ad-free day
- Optional 4th: "Save as wallpaper" → high-res quote image
- Use test ad unit IDs first
- This setup makes users watch 8–15 rewarded ads/day willingly → ₹300–₹850 eCPM blended

SPLASH SCREEN:
- Animated Lottie or custom (app name + brain/mic icon)
- 2.5 seconds → check Remote Config → go to Home

CROSS-PLATFORM (Android + iOS):
- Full support, flutter_native_splash configured
- iOS permissions in Info.plist

SCREEN SIZE ADAPTATION:
- flutter_screenutil: ^5.9.0 → ScreenUtilInit(designSize: Size(375,812))
- All sizes use .w .h .sp

MULTI-LANGUAGE SUPPORT:
- get: ^4.6.6
- 8 languages: English, Hindi, Spanish, Mandarin(zh_CN), French, German, Arabic, Japanese
- Manual selector in Settings + auto-detect fallback
- Full translation files

FIREBASE REMOTE CONFIG (FORCE UPDATE):
- Params: force_update (bool), latest_version (string), update_message (string)
- Fetch on splash & after shift
- If true → block app with localized dialog + store link

SETTINGS SCREEN (gear icon top-right):
- Current version
- Language selector (dropdown + flags)
- Privacy Policy (url_launcher)
- Rate app
- Share app
- About

TECH STACK (exact):
- flutter_native_splash: ^2.4.1
- flutter_screenutil: ^5.9.0
- get: ^4.6.6
- speech_to_text: ^6.6.0
- flutter_tts: ^3.10.0
- http: ^1.2.0
- google_mobile_ads: ^5.1.0
- get_storage: ^2.1.1
- firebase_remote_config: ^4.4.0
- firebase_core: ^2.24.0
- url_launcher: ^6.2.0
- share_plus: ^7.2.0
- lottie: ^3.1.0

HUGGING FACE LLM:
- meta-llama/Meta-Llama-3-8B-Instruct
- Full safety + 5 styles prompt (include exact prompt from previous messages)
- Send detected/manual language

TTS MOOD CONTROL (pitch/rate based on style)

LOCAL STREAK (Day X • Y shifts)

UI:
- Dark blue-purple gradient
- Pulsing mic button
- Status text changes
- Confetti on shift end
- Force update full-screen

Generate the complete project ready for flutter build apk --release && flutter build est_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"4ab0f398-3ce3-4a63-86f9-a7ae6e80e6e7","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:36:25.050Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"e9528aee-bb48-4e24-90d9-30a7907fba22","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:36:30.006Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"a1d95a7f-cd37-44bb-be26-1ed94977ec1a","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:36:48.698Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"d3dfca76-b65e-485a-a09e-bfd4b81d0720","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:37:38.099Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"history-summary","summaryVersion":3,"request_id":"3ad5887d-7d61-4e84-8fd1-c20cf60dfbf6","request_message":"

Here is the summary:
<summary>
# Summary of Conversation

## 1. Previous Conversation:
The user requested the creation of a complete, production-ready Flutter app called "MoodShift AI" - a viral ADHD/mood shifter app for both Android and iOS. The app's core feature is a voice-in/voice-out interaction where users hold a mic button, speak anything, and receive AI-generated voice responses in one of 5 mood styles (Chaos Energy, Gentle Grandma, Permission Slip, Reality Check, Micro Dare). The user provided extremely detailed specifications including exact monetization strategy with AdMob (banner ads, interstitial every 4th shift, and 3 rewarded ad buttons after every shift), multi-language support (8 languages), Firebase Remote Config for force updates, screen size adaptation with flutter_screenutil, and integration with Hugging Face's Meta-Llama-3-8B-Instruct model.

## 2. Current Work:
I have successfully created the complete Flutter project structure with all required files. The work completed includes:
- Project configuration (pubspec.yaml with all dependencies)
- Main app structure with GetX state management
- Complete multi-language support with 8 translation files
- All core services (AI, Speech, TTS, AdMob, Storage, Remote Config)
- Three main screens (Splash, Home, Settings) with controllers, bindings, and views
- Android configuration (AndroidManifest.xml, build.gradle files, ProGuard rules)
- iOS configuration (Info.plist with permissions, Podfile)
- Comprehensive README with setup instructions
- Task tracking showing all major components completed

## 3. Key Technical Concepts:
- **Flutter Framework**: Cross-platform mobile development
- **GetX State Management**: Reactive state management, dependency injection, routing
- **flutter_screenutil**: Responsive design with .w, .h, .sp extensions (designSize: 375x812)
- **AdMob Integration**: Banner (always visible), Interstitial (every 4th shift), Rewarded ads (3 types)
- **Firebase Services**: Remote Config for force updates, Firebase Core
- **Voice Services**: speech_to_text for input, flutter_tts for output with mood-based pitch/rate
- **AI Integration**: Hugging Face API with Meta-Llama-3-8B-Instruct model
- **Local Storage**: GetStorage for streak tracking, preferences, ad-free periods
- **Multi-language**: GetX translations with 8 languages
- **Confetti Animation**: Visual feedback on shift completion
- **Test Ad Unit IDs**: Using Google's test IDs initially

## 4. Relevant Files and Code:

- **pubspec.yaml**
 - All dependencies configured: get ^4.6.6, flutter_screenutil ^5.9.0, speech_to_text ^6.6.0, flutter_tts ^3.10.0, google_mobile_ads ^5.1.0, firebase packages, etc.
 - Assets configured for images, animations, fonts (Poppins family)

- **lib/main.dart**
 - App initialization with Firebase, GetStorage, MobileAds
 - ScreenUtilInit with designSize 375x812
 - GetMaterialApp with translations and routes
 - Portrait-only orientation

- **lib/app/services/ai_service.dart**
 - 5 MoodStyle enum values
 - Hugging Face API integration with safety prompts
 - Fallback responses for each style in multiple languages
 - Token placeholder: `YOUR_HUGGING_FACE_API_TOKEN`

- **lib/app/services/ad_service.dart**
 - Banner, Interstitial, and 3 Rewarded ad instances
 - Test ad unit IDs for Android/iOS
 - Ad-free period checking
 - Automatic reload after ad display
 - Interstitial shown every 4th shift

- **lib/app/services/speech_service.dart**
 - Microphone permission handling
 - Speech recognition with language-specific locale IDs
 - Real-time recognition with partial results

- **lib/app/services/tts_service.dart**
 - Mood-based pitch and rate modulation
 - Golden voice feature (warmer, slower)
 - 2x stronger replay functionality
 - Language-specific voice selection

- **lib/app/services/storage_service.dart**
 - Streak tracking (day counter, daily shifts)
 - Shift counter for interstitial ads
 - Ad-free period (24 hours)
 - Golden voice period (1 hour)
 - Last response storage for 2x feature

- **lib/app/services/remote_config_service.dart**
 - Force update mechanism
 - Version comparison logic
 - Parameters: force_update, latest_version, update_message

- **lib/app/modules/home/home_controller.dart**
 - AppState enum: idle, listening, processing, speaking
 - Complete voice flow: mic press → listen → process → speak → show rewards
 - Confetti controller
 - 3 rewarded ad button handlers
 - Force update dialog

- **lib/app/modules/home/home_view.dart**
 - Dark blue-purple gradient background
 - Pulsing mic button with size animation
 - Streak display with fire icon
 - 3 rewarded ad buttons (orange, amber, green)
 - Banner ad at bottom
 - Confetti widget

- **lib/app/translations/** (8 files)
 - en_us.dart, hi_in.dart, es_es.dart, zh_cn.dart, fr_fr.dart, de_de.dart, ar_sa.dart, ja_jp.dart
 - All UI strings translated including errors, settings, ad button text

- **android/app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml**
 - Permissions: INTERNET, RECORD_AUDIO, MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS
 - AdMob App ID meta-data (test ID)
 - Package: com.moodshift.ai

- **android/app/build.gradle**
 - compileSdkVersion 34, minSdkVersion 21
 - MultiDex enabled
 - ProGuard enabled for release
 - Google Services plugin

- **ios/Runner/Info.plist**
 - Microphone and speech recognition permissions with descriptions
 - AdMob App ID (test ID)
 - SKAdNetwork items for iOS 14+ ad attribution
 - Portrait-only orientation

- **README.md**
 - Complete setup instructions
 - Firebase, Hugging Face, AdMob configuration steps
 - Asset requirements (fonts, images)
 - Build commands for Android/iOS
 - TODO checklist before production

## 5. Problem Solving:
- Successfully structured the entire app following GetX architecture patterns
- Implemented exact monetization strategy as specified (banner always visible, interstitial every 4th, 3 rewarded buttons after each shift)
- Created comprehensive safety prompts for AI to handle harmful content gracefully
- Configured mood-based TTS modulation for each of the 5 styles
- Set up proper permission handling for both Android and iOS
- Used test ad unit IDs to allow immediate testing without AdMob account setup
- Created placeholder for Hugging Face API token that needs user replacement
- Configured ProGuard rules to prevent issues with Flutter, Firebase, and AdMob in release builds

## 6. Pending Tasks and Next Steps:

All major tasks have been completed. The project structure is fully created and ready for:

**Remaining setup steps for the user:**
1. Add required assets (Poppins fonts, splash logo image) to assets/ directories
2. Run `flutterfire configure` to set up Firebase properly
3. Replace `YOUR_HUGGING_FACE_API_TOKEN` in `lib/app/services/ai_service.dart`
4. Replace test AdMob IDs with production IDs in `lib/app/services/ad_service.dart`, AndroidManifest.xml, and Info.plist
5. Add app icons using flutter_launcher_icons
6. Configure app signing for Android and iOS
7. Update privacy policy URL and app store URLs in settings controller
8. Run `flutter pub get` to install dependencies
9. Run `flutter pub run flutter_native_splash:create` to generate splash screens
10. Test on physical devices
11. Build release versions: `flutter build apk --release` and `flutter build ipa --release`

The complete production-ready app structure has been delivered as requested with all specifications implemented.

</summary>

I will continue the conversation from this point."},{"id":1,"type":5,"content":"","tool_use":{"tool_use_id":"toolu_vrtx_016Hau4j1PyNumU2fKBhGZBn","tool_name":"save-file","input_json":"{"instructions_reminder": "LIMIT THE FILE CONTENT TO AT MOST 300 LINES. IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "SETUP_GUIDE.md", "file_content": "# MoodShift AI - Complete Setup Guide\n\n## \ud83d\ude80 Quick Start (5 Minutes)\n\n### Step 1: Install Flutter\nIf you haven't already, install Flutter from https://flutter.dev/docs/get-started/install\n\nVerify installation:\n```bash\nflutter doctor\n```\n\n### Step 2: Get Dependencies\n```bash\ncd mood_shift_ai\nflutter pub get\n```\n\n### Step 3: Add Required Assets\n\n#### Download Poppins Font\n1. Go to https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Poppins\n2. Click \"Download family\"\n3. Extract and copy these files to `assets/fonts/`:\n - `Poppins-Regular.ttf`\n - `Poppins-Medium.ttf`\n - `Poppins-SemiBold.ttf`\n - `Poppins-Bold.ttf`\n\n#### Create Splash Logo\n1. Create a simple logo image (512x512 px)\n2. Save as `assets/images/splash_logo.png`\n3. Or use a placeholder from https://placeholder.com/\n\n### Step 4: Firebase Setup (CRITICAL)\n\n#### Using FlutterFire CLI (Easiest):\n```bash\n# Install FlutterFire CLI\ndart pub global activate flutterfire_cli\n\n# Login to Firebase\nfirebase login\n\n# Configure your project\nflutterfire configure\n```\n\nThis will:\n- Create a Firebase project (or select existing)\n- Register Android and iOS apps\n- Download configuration files\n- Generate `lib/firebase_options.dart`\n\n#### Manual Setup (Alternative):\n1. Go to https://console.firebase.google.com/\n2. Create new project: \"MoodShift AI\"\n3. Add Android app:\n - Package name: `com.moodshift.ai`\n - Download `google-services.json`\n - Place in `android/app/`\n4. Add iOS app:\n - Bundle ID: `com.moodshift.ai`\n - Download `GoogleService-Info.plist`\n - Place in `ios/Runner/`\n5. Enable Remote Config in Firebase Console\n\n### Step 5: Hugging Face API Token\n\n1. Create account at https://huggingface.co/\n2. Go to https://huggingface.co/settings/tokens\n3. Create new token (read access is enough)\n4. Copy token\n5. Open `lib/app/services/ai_service.dart`\n6. Replace line 17:\n```dart\nstatic const String _apiToken = 'hf_YOUR_ACTUAL_TOKEN_HERE';\n```\n\n### Step 6: Run the App!\n\n```bash\n# For Android\nflutter run\n\n# For iOS (Mac only)\nflutter run\n```\n\n## \ud83c\udfaf Production Setup\n\n### 1. AdMob Configuration\n\n#### Create AdMob Account\n1. Go to https://admob.google.com/\n2. Sign up / Sign in\n3. Create new app for Android and iOS\n\n#### Create Ad Units\nCreate these ad units:\n\n**Android:**\n- 1x Banner Ad\n- 1x Interstitial Ad\n- 3x Rewarded Ad (or use same ID for all 3)\n\n**iOS:**\n- 1x Banner Ad\n- 1x Interstitial Ad\n- 3x Rewarded Ad (or use same ID for all 3)\n\n#### Update Ad Unit IDs\n\nOpen `lib/app/services/ad_service.dart` and replace test IDs:\n\n```dart\nString get bannerAdUnitId {\n if (Platform.isAndroid) {\n return 'ca-app-pub-XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX/YYYYYYYYYY'; // Your Android banner ID\n } else if (Platform.isIOS) {\n return 'ca-app-pub-XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX/YYYYYYYYYY'; // Your iOS banner ID\n }\n return '';\n}\n\n// Repeat for interstitialAdUnitId and rewardedAdUnitId\n```\n\n#### Update AdMob App IDs\n\n**Android** - `android/app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml`:\n```xml\n<meta-data\n android:name=\"com.google.android.gms.ads.APPLICATION_ID\"\n android:value=\"ca-app-pub-XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX~YYYYYYYYYY\"/>\n```\n\n**iOS** - `ios/Runner/Info.plist`:\n```xml\n<key>GADApplicationIdentifier</key>\n<string>ca-app-pub-XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX~YYYYYYYYYY</string>\n```\n\n### 2. App Icons\n\nUse `flutter_launcher_icons` package:\n\n1. Add to `pubspec.yaml` (already in dev_dependencies)\n2. Create icon image (1024x1024 px)\n3. Add configuration to `pubspec.yaml`:\n```yaml\nflutter_icons:\n android: true\n ios: true\n image_path: \"assets/images/app_icon.png\"\n```\n4. Run: `flutter pub run flutter_launcher_icons`\n\n### 3. App Signing\n\n#### Android Signing\n\n1. Create keystore:\n```bash\nkeytool -genkey -v -keystore ~/moodshift-release-key.jks -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 -alias moodshift\n```\n\n2. Create `android/key.properties`:\n```properties\nstorePassword=YOUR_STORE_PASSWORD\nkeyPassword=YOUR_KEY_PASSWORD\nkeyAlias=moodshift\nstoreFile=/path/to/moodshift-release-key.jks\n```\n\n3. Update `android/app/build.gradle`:\n```gradle\ndef keystoreProperties = new Properties()\ndef keystorePropertiesFile = rootProject.file('key.properties')\nif (keystorePropertiesFile.exists()) {\n keystoreProperties.load(new FileInputStream(keystorePropertiesFile))\n}\n\nandroid {\n ...\n signingConfigs {\n release {\n keyAlias keystoreProperties['keyAlias']\n keyPassword keystoreProperties['keyPassword']\n storeFile keystoreProperties['storeFile'] ? file(keystoreProperties['storeFile']) : null\n storePassword keystoreProperties['storePassword']\n }\n }\n buildTypes {\n release {\n signingConfig signingConfigs.release\n ...\n }\n }\n}\n```\n\n#### iOS Signing\n\n1. Open `ios/Runner.xcworkspace` in Xcode\n2. Select Runner \u2192 Signing & Capabilities\n3. Select your team\n4. Xcode will automatically manage signing\n\n### 4. Privacy Policy & URLs\n\nUpdate these in `lib/app/modules/settings/settings_controller.dart`:\n\n```dart\n// Privacy Policy URL\nconst url = 'https://your-website.com/privacy-policy';\n\n// App Store URLs\nconst androidUrl = 'https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.moodshift.ai';\nconst iosUrl = 'https://apps.apple.com/app/id1234567890';\n```\n\n### 5. Firebase Remote Config\n\n1. Go to Firebase Console \u2192 Remote Config\n2. Add parameters:\n\n| Parameter | Type | Default Value |\n|-----------|------|---------------|\n| force_update | Boolean | false |\n| latest_version | String | 1.0.0 |\n| update_message | String | A new version is available. Please update to continue using the app. |\n\n3. Publish changes\n\n### 6. Build for Release\n\n#### Android APK\n```bash\nflutter build apk --release\n```\nOutput: `build/app/outputs/flutter-apk/app-release.apk`\n\n#### Android App Bundle (for Play Store)\n```bash\nflutter build appbundle --release\n```\nOutput: `build/app/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab`\n\n#### iOS\n```bash\nflutter build ipa --release\n```\nThen open Xcode and upload to App Store Connect.\n\n## \ud83e\uddea Testing Checklist\n\nBefore releasing:\n\n- [ ] Test on multiple Android devices (different screen sizes)\n- [ ] Test on multiple iOS devices (iPhone & iPad)\n- [ ] Test all 8 languages\n- [ ] Test voice input/output\n- [ ] Test all ad types (banner, interstitial, rewarded)\n- [ ] Test force update mechanism\n- [ ] Test streak tracking\n- [ ] Test settings (language change, share, rate)\n- [ ] Test offline behavior\n- [ ] Test microphone permissions\n- [ ] Verify privacy policy link works\n- [ ] Verify app store links work\n\n## \ud83d\udc1b Common Issues & Solutions\n\n### Issue: \"google-services.json not found\"\n**Solution**: Make sure file is in `android/app/` directory\n\n### Issue: \"GoogleService-Info.plist not found\"\n**Solution**: Make sure file is in `ios/Runner/` directory\n\n### Issue: Ads not showing\n**Solution**: \n- Check AdMob app IDs are correct\n- Wait 1-2 hours after creating ad units\n- Test ads may take time to load first time\n\n### Issue: Voice recognition not working\n**Solution**: \n- Check microphone permissions\n- Test on real device (not emulator)\n- Check internet connection\n\n### Issue: iOS build fails\n**Solution**:\n```bash\ncd ios\npod deintegrate\npod install --repo-update\ncd ..\nflutter clean\nflutter pub get\nflutter build ios\n```\n\n### Issue: Firebase initialization error\n**Solution**: \n- Verify `google-services.json` and `GoogleService-Info.plist` are correct\n- Run `flutterfire configure` again\n- Check package names match\n\n## \ud83d\udcca Monitoring & Analytics\n\n### AdMob Dashboard\n- Monitor ad performance\n- Check eCPM rates\n- Optimize ad placements\n\n### Firebase Console\n- Monitor Remote Config usage\n- Check crash reports (if Crashlytics enabled)\n- Monitor user engagement\n\n## \ud83d\ude80 Deployment\n\n### Google Play Store\n1. Create developer account ($25 one-time fee)\n2. Create new app\n3. Upload AAB file\n4. Fill in store listing\n5. Submit for review\n\n### Apple App Store\n1. Create developer account ($99/year)\n2. Create app in App Store Connect\n3. Upload IPA via Xcode or Transporter\n4. Fill in app information\n5. Submit for review\n\n## \ud83d\udcc8 Post-Launch\n\n### Update Strategy\n1. Increment version in `pubspec.yaml`\n2. Build new release\n3. Upload to stores\n4. Update Remote Config `latest_version`\n5. Set `force_update` to true if critical\n\n### Monetization Optimization\n- Monitor which rewarded ads perform best\n- Adjust interstitial frequency if needed\n- Test different ad networks\n- Consider in-app purchases for premium features\n\n## \ud83c\udf89 You're Ready!\n\nYour MoodShift AI app is now ready for production. Good luck with your launch! \ud83d\ude80\n"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}}],"status":"success","seen_state":"seen","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:44:41.981Z"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"65ee55b0-749f-4708-bc98-34ce6224812f","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:38:23.727Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"886ca7a3-fd3d-4868-be7d-8c1e79b0f44d","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:38:48.638Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"ee19c2f6-e6f9-4f97-8d21-ceef0d4c95d6","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:39:28.922Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"352eade3-1d98-473f-a834-a9809ed0ec58","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:40:30.819Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"8e89d860-2267-425f-acf8-69381ae39a06","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:40:39.470Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"c02fd9b1-c543-4509-bcb3-a2d0cbf1c7f1","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:41:55.139Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"29dacfef-725f-49c9-95d2-af8e414c908b","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:41:59.493Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"44fe9562-f881-4c45-97b9-ea6638d1d983","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:42:04.623Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"07be487b-d051-48a2-b426-4a797a2dd63e","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:42:45.302Z","request_message":"","status":"success","seen_state":"unseen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"4c825097-edc6-46a4-8ef3-b03f36a34ede","timestamp":"2025-11-22T07:42:54.350Z","request_mess
